entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [LSP] Support language experiences for roslyn options in editorconfig files #62758
  • Confusing error message assigning `in` parameter reference to `ref` field #62756
  • Use LocalClientSettingsStorageLocation to store TodoCommentOptions #62754
    17.4
  • Migrate options stored in local registry to roaming options, where it makes sense #62748
    Backlog
  • use of `ReadOnlySpan` inside `foreach` #62747
  • Find All References doesn't find all references of a type parameter in a generic method. #62744
  • UseExpressionBodyCodeFixProvider encountered error and has been disabled - VS 2022 17.3.0 Preview 3.0 #62739
    17.4
  • Feature 'Missing import discovery' is currently unavailable due to an internal error. #62737
  • Change the `LifetimeAnnotationAttribute` constructor signature to take a single value. #62734
    17.4
  • `IsKnownIDEDiagnosticId` implementation doesn't look correct #62733
    Backlog
  • `AbstractRemoveUnusedParametersAndValuesDiagnosticAnalyzer` has 'unnecessary' descriptors but doesn't derive unnecessary analyzer base class #62731
    Backlog
  • Incorrectly reported implicit conversion #62728
  • Code CleanUp doesnt not work as expected #62727

Closed

  • VS does not show me the function declaration (arguments) when it hits an error #62742
  • CS0121 for extension methods with and without ref modifier #62729
  • New rename UI shouldn't show "Include overload(s)" for locals/params/properties/fields #62267
    17.4

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix GetNext/PreviousDirective's handling of duplicate trivia #62760
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert "Revert "Generalize RoamingProfileStorageLocation to ClientSettingsStorageLocation (#62684)"" #62759
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify find refs helpers #62755
    Area-IDE
  • All text editor options are roaming #62753
    Area-IDE
  • Find references to type-parameters used in object-creation expressions. #62752
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62749
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Delete obsolete internal options #62746
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Use actual equivalence keys, not loc strings to distinguish helpers #62740
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify `AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer` constructors #62736
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Fix PR Validation pipeline #62757
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Revert "Update SymReader to the latest version (#62695)" #62743
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Revert #62684 and #62695 to resolve infra issues #62745
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62750
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62751
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Allow diagnostic tagging to use either push or pull diagnostics #62738
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Change ServiceHub host names #60778
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Apply changes directly to text buffer - take 2 #62617
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Pass LineFormatting options into OmniSharpCodeAction options #62712
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62724
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62726
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62725
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Allow symbol keys to resolve against error symbols. #62681
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62723
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62722
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62721
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix new rename showing overloads when not applicable #62559
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62763
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62762
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Improve SyntaxTree/Node.Dump() #62703
    Area-Compilers
  • Document Outline Feature #61784
    Area-IDE
  • Block constant and relational pattern matching on types inheriting from or constrained to INumberBase<T> #62653
    Area-Compilers
  • First steps of the hovering feature and simple test case #62569
    Community
  • Generate ReadyToRun binaries for OOP #62518
    Area-IDE
  • Support ref field assignment in object initializers #62584
    Area-Compilers
  • Find the right symbol when following type forwards #62406
    Area-IDE
  • Move our C# syntax generator over to be an IIncrementalGenerator #62682
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix semantic model to handle ParenthesizedVariableDesignation #54439
    Area-Compilers
  • Run suppressors insofar as there are suppressible errors #62641
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix project based CompletionProvider #61976
    Area-IDE, IDE-IntelliSense
  • windows build optimizations #62336
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #62573
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Clear ValueTracking on solution close #61815
    Area-IDE
  • Add external access for unit test generation #62633
    Area-IDE
  • Cleanup AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #60537
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Add more telemetry for rename #61370
    Area-IDE
  • Remove Duplicate Custom UI Visualizer Attributes from CLR Types #57828
    Area-Compilers
